name: George Spence
summary: George Spence - Data Engineer @ Hexegic | MChem(Hons)

experiences: Promoted to sub-team lead after 6 months for delivering high-impact data-engineering solutions; mentored 5 junior engineers and led code reviews across a 5-person team to ensure best practices and maintain quality and consistency.
Automated large-scale data ingestion pipelines using PySpark on Palantir Foundry, processing 100+ GB of structured and semi-structured data daily.
Built a Python ETL library to standardise ingestion of 15+ disparate data sources, with support for schema changes via config versioning and data health checks.
Modelled complex relational ontologies to represent real-world data relationships and enable cross-domain analytics.
Developed responsive operational dashboards using TypeScript within Palantir Foundry, delivering real-time insights for decision-making.
Led the recovery of a challenging project ahead of contract review, resolving frontend and ontology issues and restoring stakeholder confidence.

work_experience.company: Defence Science and Technology Laboratories - MOD
experiences: Developed data acquisition and HMI/SCADA systems in DAQFactory, leveraging Python (Pandas, Matplotlib) to characterise chemical sensors.
Managed international collaboration with a US research lab to evaluate chemical sensor performance for UK MOD procurement.
Facilitated robotics and autonomy research, including conducting data analysis for large scale trials, presenting at workshops, and drafting funding proposals.
Conducted chemical synthesis for pharmaceutical research projects, leading to a 50-fold increase in biochemical potency of a novel antibiotic drug candidate.

projects.name: This CV (HTML, CSS, Python)
points: Templated with Jinja2 and styled with HTML/CSS
